long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install the BAS plug-in, enter the domain name string starting with httpb through the address bar, and implement the blockchain domain name resolution service.
For example: entering httpb://bas page will redirect to http://www.baschain.cn . The domain name mapping relationship is configured through BASChain (https://www.baschain.cn) and stored on the blockchain.
